mapper.select: select p.id, productname, productdes, p.img, chengben, kedanjia, kucun, fahuotianshu, chandi, guige, companyid, createtime, p.status, updatetime, producttype, spare1, spare2,detailimg ,t.type_name from product p left join producttype t on t.id = p.producttype where p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into product(productname, productdes, img,detailimg, chengben, kedanjia, kucun, fahuotianshu, chandi, guige, companyid, createtime, status, updatetime, producttype, spare1, spare2) values (#{productname}, #{productdes}, #{img},#{detailimg}, #{chengben}, #{kedanjia}, #{kucun}, #{fahuotianshu}, #{chandi}, #{guige}, #{companyid}, now(), #{status}, now(), #{producttype}, #{spare1}, #{spare2})

insert into product(productname, productdes, img, chengben, kedanjia, kucun, fahuotianshu, chandi, guige, companyid, createtime, status, updatetime, producttype, spare1, spare2) values
(#{entity.productname}, #{entity.productdes}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.chengben}, #{entity.kedanjia}, #{entity.kucun}, #{entity.fahuotianshu}, #{entity.chandi}, #{entity.guige}, #{entity.companyid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.producttype}, #{entity.spare1}, #{entity.spare2})

insert into product(productname, productdes, img, chengben, kedanjia, kucun, fahuotianshu, chandi, guige, companyid, createtime, status, updatetime, producttype, spare1, spare2) values
(#{entity.productname}, #{entity.productdes}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.chengben}, #{entity.kedanjia}, #{entity.kucun}, #{entity.fahuotianshu}, #{entity.chandi}, #{entity.guige}, #{entity.companyid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.producttype}, #{entity.spare1}, #{entity.spare2})
on duplicate key update productname = values(productname), productdes = values(productdes), img = values(img), chengben = values(chengben), kedanjia = values(kedanjia), kucun = values(kucun), fahuotianshu = values(fahuotianshu), chandi = values(chandi), guige = values(guige), companyid = values(companyid), createtime = values(createtime), status = values(status), updatetime = values(updatetime), producttype = values(producttype), spare1 = values(spare1), spare2 = values(spare2)
mapper.update:
update product
productname = #{productname},
productdes = #{productdes},
img = #{img},
detailimg = #{detailimg},
chengben = #{chengben},
kedanjia = #{kedanjia},
kucun = #{kucun},
fahuotianshu = #{fahuotianshu},
chandi = #{chandi},
guige = #{guige},
companyid = #{companyid},
createtime = #{createtime},
status = #{status},
updatetime = now(),
producttype = #{producttype},
spare1 = #{spare1},
spare2 = #{spare2},
where id = #{id}
